decks.notes: This Jund Aggro deck focuses on sacrificing creatures for value and dealing direct damage to the opponent. With cards like Cauldron Familiar and Mayhem Devil, you can repeatedly trigger effects by sacrificing creatures and dealing damage. Using cards like Witch's Oven and Deadly Dispute, you can generate card advantage while also disrupting your opponent's board. Ygra, Eater of All serves as a powerful finisher, while cards like Fatal Push provide removal options. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with constant pressure and incremental advantage through sacrificing creatures.

The deck focuses on aggressive plays using low-cost creatures and removal spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. It also includes cards that disrupt the opponent's hand and graveyard to maintain control of the game. The mana base is optimized for consistency and speed, allowing for efficient casting of spells. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure early in the game and maintain it to secure a victory before the opponent can stabilize.

This deck focuses on quickly sacrificing creatures to trigger powerful abilities such as dealing damage to opponents or gaining resources. It utilizes cards like Cauldron Familiar, Mayhem Devil, and Witch's Oven to create value from sacrificing creatures. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion provides additional consistency and mana fixing. With a mix of efficient removal spells and disruptive hand disruption, this aggressive Rakdos Sacrifice deck aims to overwhelm opponents and control the game through sacrificing creatures for various benefits.

This deck focuses on quickly developing a board presence with aggressive artifact creatures and using powerful artifacts like Ensoul Artifact to enhance them. By combining cards like Smuggler's Copter and Spyglass Siren with direct damage spells like Shrapnel Blast, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents while disrupting their game plan with cards like Spell Pierce and Shadowspear. Jegantha, the Wellspring provides additional value as a companion, and the deck's mana base is carefully constructed to support its aggressive playstyle.

The main concept of this deck is to play aggressively by utilizing low-cost creatures with strong combat abilities, supported by combat tricks and pump spells to make them more effective in combat. The deck also includes some versatile creatures like Inti, Seneschal of the Sun and Emberheart Challenger to provide additional options for dealing with different threats. The mana base is designed to provide a consistent and fast mana base to support the aggressive game plan.

This deck focuses on controlling the game while ramping up mana with cards like Escape to the Wilds and Ancient Cornucopia. The goal is to accelerate into powerful threats like Omnath, Locus of Creation and Zacama, Primal Calamity to overwhelm the opponent. Yorion, Sky Nomad provides additional value by flickering permanents for extra card advantage. The deck also includes various utility cards and planeswalkers like Nissa, Resurgent Animist and Kenrith, the Returned King to provide versatility and flexibility in different matchups.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly through cards like Lotus Cobra and Omnath, Locus of Creation, while controlling the board with removal spells like Frost Bite and Extinction Event. The deck utilizes the graveyard with cards like Splendid Reclamation and Escape to the Wilds to fuel its strategy. Yorion, Sky Nomad serves as a companion to provide additional value through blinking permanents. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue its opponent by overwhelming them with powerful threats and efficient removal spells.
